A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars at its worst. The one star is for the Kylo Ren storyline. Everything else in this movie was poorly written. Classic characters made to be cartoony versions of themselves. Awkward appearance by Yoda\, laughing as he set the tree and books on fire? Huh? What a joke this movie is. This is how Star Wars ends with thunderous applause...
